Fakedata.name: Summerberry Cooler
Fakedata.recipes: Raspberry, apple juice, strawberry and concentrated lemonade altogether make for a frosty summer treat that everyone will adore.

Fakedata.name: Citrus Strawberry Mocktail
Fakedata.recipes: Refresh and rehydrate with this citrusy drink! Several ingredients combine to create this colorful treat, made with strawberry, orange juice, icing sugar, sparkling powder, and a hint of basil.

Fakedata.name: Sparkling Cherry Limeade
Fakedata.recipes: Cherry juice, lemon wedges, lime juice and sugar pair together deliciously with sparkling water. This is just what you need!

Fakedata.name: Mint Zing
Fakedata.recipes: Quench your thirst with this refreshing drink, loaded with fresh fruits and herbs. It's a low calorie sweet fruity drink that will give your digestive system a healthy boost!

Fakedata.name: Beach Tropicana
Fakedata.recipes: The flavor combination is so addictive you'll find yourself craving for more.

Fakedata.name: Paneer Butter Masala
Fakedata.recipes: Paneer Butter Masala is one of India’s most popular paneer recipe. This recipe with Indian cottage cheese cubes in a creamy tomato sauce is a best one that I have been making for a long time.

Fakedata.name: Paneer Manchurian
Fakedata.recipes: This Paneer Manchurian Gravy of crispy paneer cubes in a sour & umami gravy or sauce. You will find this Paneer Manchurian with sauce in many restaurants serving Chinese food.

Fakedata.name: Baby Corn Manchurian
Fakedata.recipes: The recipe of Baby corn manchurian gravy has spicy, sweet, umami and sour tastes that taste great with veg fried rice or veg noodles or hakka noodles.

Fakedata.name: Kadai Mushroom
Fakedata.recipes: Kadai Mushroom is such a super easy and delicious dish of sautéed button mushrooms, onions, bell peppers (capsicum) in a spiced, tangy tomato sauce. The recipe comes together in 30 minutes and so delish with naan, roti and even bread rolls.

Fakedata.name: Mushroom manchurian
Fakedata.recipes: For all mushroom lovers, this is another fantastic spicy Indo Chinese recipe of mushroom manchurian dry. A vegan dish
